# Examples

> This is a blockquote.

> [!NOTE]
> This is a note.

> [!WARNING]
> This is a warning.

> [!IMPORTANT]
> This is important.

> [!TIP]
> This is a tip.

> [!CAUTION]
> This is a caution.

## Examples with paragraphs between

> [!NOTE]
> This is a note.

This is a paragraph.

> [!WARNING]
> This is a warning.

This is a paragraph.

> [!IMPORTANT]
> This is important.

This is a paragraph.

> [!TIP]
> This is a tip.

This is a paragraph.

> [!CAUTION]
> This is a caution.

This is a paragraph.

> This is a blockquote.

### Without empty lines between

> [!NOTE]
> This is a note.
This is a paragraph.
> [!WARNING]
> This is a warning.
This is a paragraph.
> [!IMPORTANT]
> This is important.
This is a paragraph.
> [!TIP]
> This is a tip.
This is a paragraph.
> [!CAUTION]
> This is a caution.
This is a paragraph.
> This is a blockquote.

### With empty lines after but not before

> [!NOTE]
> This is a note.
This is a paragraph.

> [!WARNING]
> This is a warning.
This is a paragraph.

> [!IMPORTANT]
> This is important.
This is a paragraph.

> [!TIP]
> This is a tip.
This is a paragraph.

> [!CAUTION]
> This is a caution.
This is a paragraph.

> This is a blockquote.

### With empty lines before but not after

> [!NOTE]
> This is a note.

This is a paragraph.
> [!WARNING]
> This is a warning.

This is a paragraph.
> [!IMPORTANT]
> This is important.

This is a paragraph.
> [!TIP]
> This is a tip.

This is a paragraph.
> [!CAUTION]
> This is a caution.

This is a paragraph.
> This is a blockquote.
